tweet:
There's a cold war coming on the radio, I heard 
 Baby, it's a violent world - Coldplay

This lightning storm 
This tidal wave 
 This avalanche, I'm not afraid, 
C'mon, c'mon no one can see me cry - R.E.M

You mention the time we were together
So long ago, well I don't remember
All I know is that it makes me feel good now - The Motels

I was fearless like a renegade 
had a feeling I can't explain 
I did  n't listen to what people said 
I came,I saw,I conquered - Madonna

I was constant as northern star 
had a fire burning in my heart 
never gave up fighting in the dark 
I came, I saw, I conquered -Madonna

I took the money 
I spiked your drink 
You miss too much these days if you stop to think - U2

Waves of regret and waves of joy 
I reached out for the one I tried to destroy - U2

Every mistake I've ever made 
Has been rehashed and then replayed 
As I got lost along the way - Robbie Williams (RW)

And you know cos my life's a mess
And I'm trying to grow so before I'm old I'll confess
You think that I'm strong you're wrong - Robbie W

We have a greed with which we have agreed
And you think you have to want more than you need
Until you have it all you won't be free
-Eddie V

When you want more than you have
You think you need
And when you think more than you want
Your thoughts begin to bleed
- Eddie Vedder

Yeah I left with nothing
But the thought you'd be there too
Looking for you
I went wandering - U2

I went out riding
Down that old eight lane
I passed by a thousand signs
Looking for my own name
- U2

I went out there
In search of experience
To taste and to touch
And to feel as much
As a man can
Before he repents
- U2

Blame yourself it's easier
There's no need to trouble her..you trouble her - Robbie Williams (RW)

Jesus in a camper van he said sorry to
Leave you but I've done all I can
I suppose even the son of God
Gets it hard sometimes
-Robbie W

Amazing I'm in this maze with you
just can't crack your code
One day you screaming you love me loud
The next day you're so cold
-Justin T

People are fragile things
You should know by now
Be careful what you put them through
- Editors (Munich)

Now I'm not a saint but I'm not a sinner
Now everything is cool as long as I'm getting thinner
- Lily Allen

After the thunders spoken,
After the lightning bolt's been hurled
After the dream is broken, there'll
Still be love in the world
- Sting

I could speak a million lies, a million songs
A million rights, a million wrongs in this balance of time
 - Sting

I could be cannon food, destroyed a thousand times
Reborn as fortune's child to judge another's crimes
 -Sting

I could ride with kings and conquer many lands
Or win this world at cards and let it slip my hands
 -Sting

There is no historical precedent
To put the words in the mouth of the president
 - Sting

There's no such thing as a winnable war
It's a lie we don't believe anymore
 -Sting

Take this soul
Stranded in some skin and bones
Take this soul
And make it sing
- U2

Take these hands
And teach them what to carry
Take these hands
Don't make a fist, no
 -U2

Take this mouth
So quick to criticise
Take this mouth
Give it a kiss
- U2

I'll go down with this ship
won't put my hands up and surrender
There will be no white flag above my door
I'm in love,always will be
-Dido

Only love, only love can leave such a mark
But only love, only love can heal such a scar
- U2

But I won't cry for yesterday
There's an ordinary world Somehow I have to find
- Duran Duran

Beside the news of holy war and holy need
Ours is just a little sorrowed talk
- Duran Duran

You liked me 'till you heard my shit on the radio
But now I'm just too mainstream for you, oh no
- Nelly Furtado

I didn't hear you leave
I wonder how am I still here
And I don't want to move a thing
It might change my memory
- Dido (Here with me)

I believe in Karma what you give is what you get returned
I believe you can't appreciate real love 'til you've been burned
- Savage Garden

Love and other moments are just chemical reactions in your brain
- Savage Garden

Love don't leave me
Because I console myself that Hallmark cards are true
I really do
- Savage Garden

And time goes by so slowly
The nights are cold and lonely
I shouldn't be holding on
But I'm still holding on for you
- Savage Garden

My love she throws me like a rubber ball
Oh oh, the sweetest thing
She won't catch me or break my fall
Oh oh oh, the sweetest thing
- U2

I know I got black eyes
But they burn so brightly for her
This is a blind kind of love
Oh oh oh, the sweetest thing
- U2

You can sew it up but you still see the tear
- U2

Don't care what people say
Just follow your own way
Don't give up and use the chance
To return to innocence
 - Enigma

I'm Going Deeper Underground 
There's too much panic in this Town

There is a game I like to play
I like to hit the town on Friday night
And stay in bed until Sunday
We'll always be this free
-Cranberries

Understand what I've become
It wasn't my design
And people everywhere think
Something better than I am
- The Cranberries

Unhappiness was when I was young
And we didn't give a damn
'Cause we were raised
To see life as fun and take it if we can
- The Cranberries

And in the day
Everything's complex
There's nothing simple
When I'm not around you 
- The Cranberries

You, you are so yesterday
- Toni Braxton

I'm done with this, feeling like an idiot
Loving you, I'm over it
I just don't love you, don't love you no more
- Toni Braxton

Good love is hard to find
Good love is hard to find
You got lucky, babe
You got lucky, babe, when I found you
 - Tom Petty

Our lives are made
In these small hours
These little wonders
These twists and turns of fate
- Rob Thomas

Claim your right to science
Claim your right to see the truth
Though my pangs of conscience
Will drill a hole in you
 - Aqua

I'm not afraid of anything in this world
There's nothing you can throw at me
That haven't already heard
- U2

I'm just tryin' to find a decent melody
A song that I can sing, in my own company
- U2

I will not forsake the colours that you bring
The nights you filled with fireworks
They left you with nothin'
- U2

I am still enchanted by the light you brought to me
I still listen through your ears, and through your eyes I can see
- U2

And if the night runs over
if the day won't last
And if your way should falter
Along this stony pass
Just a moment
This time will pass
- U2

And it doesn't seem to matter, and it doesn't seem right
'Cause the will has brought no fortune
Still I cry alone at night
 - MJ

Now I can't be sure of anything
Black is white, cold is heat
For what I worshipped stole my love away
Was the ground beneath her feet
- U2

Understand it's hard to tell u
That I've given all I've to give
I can understand your feelings
But then everybody has a life to live
-Texas

This desert rose
Each of her veils a secret promise
This desert flower
No sweet perfume ever tortured me more than this
- Sting

But you are in my head
Swimming forever in my head
Tangled in my dreams
Swimming forever
- The Corrs

So I listen to the radio
And all the songs we used to know
So I listen to the radio
Remember where we used to go
- The Corrs

But I'd give it all up just for you
Just to have you near me
I'd give it all up just for you
- The Corrs

When you ring my number, you ring my head
- Texas

I doesn't feel right
The lights are too bright
I'm feeling uptight in my sensual world
I need to be you
I need to breathe too
- Texas

Yeah, I dreamed that I saw Dali
With a supermarket trolley
He was tryin' to throw his arms around a girl
- U2

Watch the early morning sun
drip like blood from the day
See the pretty people run
so many games to play
- Suede

A million cars a million trains
under the jetplane sky
Nothing lost and nothing gained
Life is just a lullabyby
- Suede

See the blue suburban dream
under the jetplane sky
Sleep away and dream a dream
life is just a lullabyby
- Suede

Early morning, April four
Shot rings out in the Memphis sky
Free at last, they took your life
They could not take your pride
- U2

The grass was greener
The light was brighter
With friends surrounded
The nights of wonder
- Pink Floyd

And where were you when I was hurt and I was helpless?
'Cause the things you say and the things you do surround me
- Pink Floyd

I took a heavenly ride through our silence
I knew the moment had arrived
For killing the past and coming back to life
- Pink Floyd

While you were hanging yourself on someone else's words
Dying to believe in what you heard
I was staring straight into the shining sun
-PF

Where were you when I was burned and broken?
While the days slipped by from my window watching
- Pink Floyd

We can begin again
Shed our skin, let the sun shine in
At the edge of the ocean
We can start over again
- Ivy

WStop
Stop haunting me
It should be easy
As easy as when you stopped wanting me
- Conjure One/Sinéad O'Connor

I've given up, stop!
On waiting any longer
I've given up
On this love getting stronger
Don't come around here no more
- Tom Petty

Should I give up or should I just keep chasing pavements
Even if it leads nowhere?
- Adele

Light up, light up
As if you have a choice
Even if you cannot hear my voice
I'll be right beside you, dear
- Leona Lewis

We used to have a life,
but now it's all gone.
Mystify...
Does it have to be so cold in Ireland, for me?
- The Cranberries

I don't believe in miracles but that don't mean they don't come true
- Bryan Adams

Well I may not get to heaven but I get a little closer when I'm with you
- Bryan Adams

We wander round in the darkness,
But every now and then a little light shines through
- Bryan Adams

Right when you think you don't need love is when you need it most
- Bryan Adams

Well there's more to truth baby - Than what we know is true
- Bryan Adams

Is there anybody out there?
Anyone that's loved in vain
Anyone that feels the same
- Bryan Adams

Is there anybody waiting?
Waiting for a chance to win
To give it up and start again?
- Bryan Adams

Is there anybody dreaming?
Dreaming of a better day
When everything goes your way
- Bryan Adams

We all need something new
Something that is true
And someone else to feel it too
- Bryan Adams

Questions of science
Science and progress
Could not speak as loud as my heart
- Coldplay

Nobody said it was easy
No one ever said it would be so hard
I'm going back to the start
- Coldplay

I'm going back to the start
- Coldplay

I'm falling for you, baby --I need a parachute
- Jennifer Lopez/Lil Wayne

There are nine million bicycles in Beijing
That's a fact
A thing we can't deny
Like the fact that I will love you till I die
-Katie Melua

There're six billion people in the world
More or less
And it makes me feel quite small
But u're the one I love the most of all
- Katie Melua

Did you know when you go it's the perfect ending
To the bad day I was just beginning
all I know is you're my favorite mistake
- Sheryl Crow
